articles.title: Miguel Almiron insists his incredible form has NOT been spurred on by Jack Grealish's outbust - Daily Mail
articles.description: Almiron has enjoyed a renaissance in his Newcastle career this season having scored eight goals in total - six in October alone - to aid their climb up the table under Eddie Howe.
articles.content: Newcastle forward Miguel Almiron has rejected the notion that his remarkable stretch of form has been spurred on by Jack Grealish after he was crowned the Premier League's October Player of the Month… [+3272 chars]
